entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@RandPaul You knucklehead! #PresidentPineSol isn't even capable of protecting staff members at the @WhiteHouse from getting #COVID19 so how do you expect a Mom & Pop business to protect themselves and their staff members.

Where is YOUR neighbor when you need him? You're a #COVIDIOT
